summary: This document is a financial alert from Deutsche Bank Private Bank regarding Richard D. Kahn, who has been flagged for critical risk due to a regulatory action involving disciplinary measures from the New York Stock Exchange. The alert details Kahn's failure to provide testimony as requested by FINRA, resulting in a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless compliance is met.

persons.name: Richard D Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is mentioned as an individual who has been subjected to regulatory action by the NYSE Arca for failing to provide requested testimony.

events.title: Regulatory Action by NYSE Arca
events.description: Richard Kahn and other respondents were found to have violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 10.2(d) by not providing testimony as requested by FINRA, leading to a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless compliance is achieved.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn is flagged for critical risk by Deutsche Bank due to a regulatory action.
Kahn was involved in a disciplinary action by the NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony.
The regulatory action occurred on April 20, 2012, resulting in a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless testimony is provided.
The alert was added to monitoring on May 30, 2018.
